name: Everybody Loves Rayguns
description:
STORY

You're a little wizard living in a tiny castle that is contained within a larger wizard's beard! To power-up the larger wizard's attacks, you must solve puzzles and collect crystals from treasure chests. When a crystal is collected, you have to throw it into a magic globe in the hub area of the game. Be quick, else the large wizard will perish, along with you and your tiny castle!

CONTROLS

~During any mode~
[T] key while in game to see in game controls
[TAB] to switch between Teleport and Scaler mode
Point and click to pick up or throw a crystal
[BACKSPACE] to return to the main menu
[ESC] to quit

~In Teleport Mode~
Right click to deploy a teleport beacon
Left click to teleport an object while pointing at it (teleport beacon needs to be deployed)
[Q] or [E] while in teleport mode to rotate the hologram while pointing at an object (teleport beacon needs to be deployed)

~In Scaler Mode~
Right click to grow objects (while pointing at an object)
Left click to shrink objects (while pointing at an object)
